author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Thirty-Four! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.
The gates of Hell have opened, the world has ended and you're in a ADRENALINE FUELED BATTLE ARENA. Inspire by games like QUAKE or DOOM or the HEXXEN, Brimstone and Lead is a fast placed arena shoot-em-up with no measuring, lots of carnage and a unique action/reaction system to keep you always engaged. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://mummylaundering.itch.io/brimstone-and-lead-arena
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 034 - BRIMSTONE & LEAD  by Dylan Green
